title: Evil Star Guardian skinline
body:
Soo I am pretty sure that the Star Guardian skins are inspired in Sailor Moon right? I think it now needs a "Villian Star Guardians" skin line as well. It would complete the whole concept imo. I was thinking in champs like {{champion:69}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:143}} , these are all compatible options since they fit this evil b*tch niche. Some of these champs have also been without a nice skin for a long time, like Cassiopeia and Zyra, this would be a nice gift to people who have been waiting very long for skins from them.
So what do you say? do you guys want aswell an evil star line skin? 

Queen Beryl: a villain from Sailor moon
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/sailormoon/images/0/0d/Queen_Beryl.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090818022322

edit1: Some people have commented that there is the Dark star line already, problem is, they do not have anything to do with the Star Guardians, Dark Star Thresh and Varus dont really make many sence, they are just there to look cool "sugoi, kakkoi", there is no connection between them and the star guardians.

replies.body: So...Dark Star?
The Dark Star skins do not really have anything to do with the Star Guardians.

> [{quoted}](name=Leu07,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zNFNjoQE,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-12-05T22:30:35.758+0000)
>
> The Dark Star skins do not really have anything to do with the Star Guardians.

then who is gonna protect us from that shit?

Nothing.
The dark star skins are supposed to be lovecraftian horrors whose powers are so far beyond ours,that our only hope for survival is that they might overlook or don't care about our planet.

Waitwaitwait...

I never made it my goal to read up on the lore behind the Star Guardian skins, besides what little I was able to garner when they came out (they all had like, little bios on SurrenderAt20). But just from what I'm seeing here; the Star Guardians are supposed to protect Runeterra from evil?
Yes,but the dark stars are from an entirely different skin-universe
So it would be something like Women vs Men? I think we should live the concept to our female champs.
More like "who would be the most unfitting candidate in the first place"
Dark Star???

Dark stars are cosmic horrors that devour entire planets.
They don't have any connection to star guardians.

well we do have Dark Stars~ 

http://orig02.deviantart.net/5227/f/2016/163/8/c/league_of_legends___dark_star_thresh___varus_by_x1stvanx-da60gvu.jpg

**Edit**: I looked through some of the comments, even if they are not connected to star guardians, dark stars are basically the opposites already to the 'Protectors of the Universe', due to the fact Dark Stars wants to destroy it, Guardians protect it.
Dark Stars are clearly meant to fight the Super Galaxy!

You just blew my mind, that makes sense o_o ...

wait, don't you mean the Super Galaxy is supposed to fight the Dark Stars? lol

But aren't star guardians just the protector of the earth?

Also what the opener is referring to is likely a group of evil magical girls,which doesn't fit dark stars obviously.

>"Star Guardians are imbued with incredible power, but with it comes a lifetime of service to the universe. It is a life burdened by responsibility and fatal consequences. Although rare, a Star Guardian may reject their fate as a protector. However, the results of such an action reverberate across the universe and beyond.

> "Star Guardians can only defeat the darkness that spreads across the universe if the stand together. They will fight as one or fall as many."

Nope, according to lore they protect the universe, if they only defended earth they wouldn't be called star guardians, but earth guardians I guess. 
But of course, they do inhabit earth, in Sailor Moon even, wasn't some of the "evil people" males?

And even if, Riot never did say that Dark Star was anti Star Guardians, but it would make sense... Star Guardian Lux, alone protecting the Universe, the Dark Stars arise, and 4 months later 4 new Star Guardians arrive... coincidence?

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Star_Guardian

**Edit**:
>As a Star Guardian fades, their power is reborn in new protectors. Star Guardians are chosen for their strength and resolve, but above all, they are chosen for their courage. It often signals a cataclysmic battle elsewhere in the universe when multiple Star Guardians are chosen to serve at once."

Which for all we know could be the Dark Stars... Because the Dark Stars probably hasn't reached Runeterra yet... (aka home planet for the League universe)

The thing is that a rioter already confirmed that the 2 aren't related
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/es/c/story-art/OWARj96q-kateykhaos-dark-star-thresh-related-to-star-guardian-or-cosmic-reaver-skin-line

And think about it.
If the 2 skin lines were related then they would have likely shown how the star guardians fight the dark stars on their promo site,yet they were always depicted fighting void champs(or Baron nashor who is also void related)

Well the thing about AU is the fact, they can cross, in a messed up way. But honestly, I doubt Riot will release any "Anti Star Guardian" skins.

First of all, it doesn't roll easy on the tongue (except for 'Dark Star' which is already occupied)..
and second of all (god this word 'reverberate')
>Although rare, a Star Guardian may reject their fate as a protector. However, the results of such an action reverberate across the universe and beyond.

What I read is that, they could of turned evil, yes, but they could of also probably been destroyed or caused a huge negative shift in the universe.

ahh.. the joys of fantasies.. Non the less, fans can think what they want to, so if you ship Star Guardians vs Dark Stars, I am not going to stop anyone, but they fight all types of 'evil' so... basically if we go into an AU in the AUs.... there's an AU for just this scenario as well... <.< ...

No they don't cross thats the entire point of having multiple skin universes.

Also that arguement about the name is really stupid,I mean its not like there are only 2 name options.
For example they could easily call them "fallen star" or something like that

And having some headcanon or fanfiction about this is ok,as long as you don't bring that as an arguement in a discussion(especially not when there are things that directly contradict this)

I didn't mean to imply that there was no other names, I was just to tired to be able to think of any good "skin titles"..
######its not that easy  ; - ; 

And I wasn't talking about canons and fanfics to be the argument. But its sort of like people who like odd food combinations.

But also the thing about crossing AU, is that, in all scenarios, there is an AU where stuff DOES cross, I'm not implying that these do, but that they **could**. Because what would keep a destroyer of the universe from traversing time and space to another dimension sort of thing. Like Taric, his old lore he was from a different universe or something like that.

Like think of it, yes, the skins are AU, but they still have Quotes towards themselves (in their classic skin) sometimes. Meaning champions are 100% aware of how time and space work, how there is sometimes two of them (blind pick). And the fact you are also bringing this AU skin into the '**real**' world (which is the current of the league).

I'm not really trying to win a discussion here but, I'm just saying whats on my mind, even if what I am saying isn't correct (about the AU and the current 'real' world) I still said my opinion on the matter. We also have to take in mind that it's a game though, anything could happen.

And lets be real here, there will probably be way more skin lines in the future, and like the boosted animal I am, I will  buy them if I like them, because I am a skin addict.

Well the quotes make sense if they meet these alternate versions of themselves(or others) on the battlefield.
But this doesn't really mean much since the game is non-canon anyway.

And in general I just don't see the star guardians standing any chance against the dark stars in the first place,I mean have you looked at the size of them?Dark star varus is shredding entire planets just by charging his Q and he is likely the lesser of the 2 evils(since DS thresh talks to him like a servant).
Meanwhile the star guardians are struggling in their fight with Baron nashor....

https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2016/06/5758a0947eeb7.jpg

So I don't feel like they really make a fitting nemesis for them,given that they'd likely destroy the whole planet by accident.

Well, yeah, but this is anime mode where "Love, friendship and magic will prevail" lol

Anyways, they were struggling with Baron because Jinx wasn't there, they were weaker without her.

I dunno man, and yeah I have, Vel'Koz, Cho is also really big, and Malphite is basically a mountain...
Trundle is also quite big, he can mosh a man with his hand ._. .... 

This is off topic but, someone asked on the boards once: If you had to fight any league of legends character, who do you think you could beat? 
... Honestly, I don't think I can beat any of them ; _;  ....
If you think of it the League universe is quite scary... Monsters, crazy girls, basically everything in this 'League Universe' wants to kill you .-.

They still struggled against Nashor in a 4v1,which gives us a good impression of how strong they are individually.
And well you know,the size of a mountain means nothing compared to that of a planet.
If malphite or Baron Nashor were on the dark star splash art,they'd be so tiny that you couldn't even see them.

The DS-champs are easily over a thousand times as big as any mountain on the earth(likely a few times even bigger than that).

Really there can be no kind of climatic conflict between these 2 due to the sheer size difference.
If they beat them with the power of love,then it would need to happen before they could even reach the earth,which would be really anticlimatic.(not to mention that it would be a ridiculous ass-pull)
And if they don't they'd be annihilated without even being able to put up a fight.


As for your question:
I really doubt that I could beat any of them in a fight either.
Unless there is some rule that prevents the use of pets or equipment,in which case I might be able to beat someone like ezreal,but even that would be quesitonable.
Runeterra is like the center of the Universe. Let's be real here.

The ore could be like that these are The Champions of Nothing: Sisters of the Star guardians who have been corrupted by the Dark Star Thresh and see that everything is striving to nothing and thus decides to get onto the winning side, joins Thresh and Varus to gain ungodly power. The names could be Balck Hole {{champion:134}}, Planter of Doubt {{champion:143}}, The Slasher of Hope {{champion:28}}, The Freezing Void (Could dress life Queen Beryl) {{champion:127}}, Burner of Dreams {{champion:25}}, The Temptress of False Hope {{champion:7}}, The Trapper of Fear {{champion:60}}.

Also while i was riding this we could have a Star Voyager {{champion:41}}.

In Star Guardian Janna's lore, it says that she didn't like to talk about her past, but she once was a member of another Star Guardian group. So, Riot will probably release the Evil Star Guardian. 

The real question is... Wheeen? ;___;   T__T!!!

Also, if they don't add {{champion:134}}, that's a sin. >__< 

Who can be the evil adc? Vayne? .__. 

Omg it would be so cool if they release a Star Guardian to all the girls + Taric. ;___; I would be taking all of them if I could, haha.

Or you can have the Dark Star Skin line act as the enemies of Star Guardian. Super Galaxies are like the Nova Corps or Green Lantern Corps. Astro skins are Runeterra seeking the stars. Star Guardians are the defenders of Earth from evil enemies.
Dark Star
